name: Revolution Derby Racing
description:
Enjoy the world of chaos and destruction with new Revolution Extreme Derby!

This game contains all best from racing and derby games and put it in one best destruction simulator.
Many tracks and different cars will leave no one indifferent!


Features:
- Next Gen Graphic
- Car's upgrades & tuning
- High detailed muscle cars
- High detailed tracks
- Nitro
- Damage physics


Revolution is here enjoy it!

News and bonuses on official page https://www.facebook.com/pages/Extreme-Games/1531656503724867
